Meanwhile, McGee is busy hunting for a new apartment, and is determined to discover how DiNozzo managed to snag his lavish home. Naval crime drama, guest starring Joe Spano

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives Fontana and Green investigate the murders of a group of heroin users in a raid on a drug den. The prime suspect is a warlord who aided American forces in Afghanistan and claims diplomatic immunity - but McCoy and Southerlyn refuse to be swayed in their attempts to prosecute. Drama, starring Dennis Farina, Jesse L Martin, Sam Waterston and Elisabeth Rohm

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A convicted child murderer is struck and left for dead by a motorist just weeks after his prison release, but Fontana and Green are initially unenthusiastic about finding out who ran him over. It is not until the killer dies from his injuries that they investigate inside the prison where he served his sentence - and uncover evidence that leads McCoy to make a startling discovery. Starring Dennis Farina

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A wealthy man is found beaten to death in his home, prompting detectives Fontana and Green to suspect the victim's wife and the contractor who installed the security system. McCoy and Southerlyn investigate an affair between the two, and seek to turn them against each other, but a second unexpected crime slows down their case

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A jockey is shot dead, leading Fontana and Falco into the murkier side of horse racing, where they discover the victim's prized thoroughbred was bought by a corporate boss using embezzled funds. McCoy takes control in court, but a witness's emotional outburst and the defendant's disappearance put the case in jeopardy. Starring Dennis Farina, Michael Imperioli and Sam Waterston

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Fontana and Falco discover a charred pistol after arresting an arsonist, which leads them to reinvestigate an unsolved murder. Their remorseful prime suspect offers a confession, hoping his new-found religious faith and charity work will benefit his case as public support builds for him

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An investigation into the murder of a US Navy captain brings to light a link to Ducky's late mother, prompting the medical examiner to question a decision he made 37 years earlier. The team members exchange holiday gifts as Gibbs spends Christmas dinner with Fornell

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team searches for new leads after an undercover operation to apprehend a businessman who apparently uses acts of terror to manipulate the stock market is compromised. Bishop and Qasim join forces to find a break in the case

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: After Gibbs spots the brother of an NCIS Most Wanted suspect, he immediately assumes his former alias and goes undercover with their infamous anti-government militia. Meanwhile, Bishop and Reeves partner on an off-the-books investigation

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Palmer faces a dilemma during a hit-and-run investigation when he spots a stranger standing on a ledge, and places his own life in peril in an attempt to get the man down to safety

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the rape of an actress on stage during an interactive theatre production, only to discover the people in the audience - including her assailant - were all wearing masks. With no other leads, they are forced to track down an obsessive fan of the victim, who filmed the crime. Starring Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The CEO of a private military contractor is found drugged and sexually assaulted in a park, but Benson and Amaro's investigation is hampered by the victim's unwillingness to cooperate. As the case progresses, they uncover a much larger crime and conspiracy in Iraq. Drama, starring Mariska Hargitay and Danny Pino

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny and Jackie investigate the death of a wealthy woman, but the case takes an unusual turn when the victim's mentally ill daughter claims God told her that the killer was her stepfather. Meanwhile, Frank is asked to look into the past of his former parish priest, who has been recommended for canonisation. Guest starring Timothy Busfield (thirtysomething) and James Rebhorn (White Collar)

programme.title: Lucifer
programme.desc: Charlotte accidentally burns a man to death, leaving Lucifer to keep Chloe from figuring what really happened, so he puts Maze in charge of locating Charlotte and Amenadiel, who have both gone missing. Meanwhile, Lucifer seeks a permanent solution for the ticking-time-bomb that is his mother.

programme.title: Lucifer
programme.desc: After waking up in the desert with his wings, Lucifer and Chloe try to work out what has happened to him. Newcomer Lieutenant Marcus Pierce makes a poor impression due to his stern demeanour, while Lucifer finds himself in another compromising situation. Drama, starring Tom Ellis and Lauren German

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Annette Fox is walking down the street with her daughter Jenna when a man in a dark hoodie snatches her purse before shooting her in the head, killing her. Annette had been due to testify in a rape case against high-profile hairdresser Luke Ronson, who swears to Benson and Stabler that he was helping out at a homeless shelter at the time. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series is centred around the roads of Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong

programme.desc: Archer permits Dr Phlox to put all the crew members into comas to allow them to pass through a trans-dimensional disturbance unscathed - though he may not be able to survive the ordeal himself. Sci-fi adventure, starring Scott Bakula and John Billingsley

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: Chakotay finds himself suffering from a strange form of amnesia as he seems unable to remember a woman he fell in love with the week before. Sci-fi adventure, starring Kate Mulgrew

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride, Sebastian and Tammy go to South America when an old colleague asks Pride for help with a classified operation that has been compromised. Crime drama, starring Scott Bakula and Lucas Black

programme.title: Killer in My Village
programme.desc: A young woman is found dead, and police are put onto the trail of a killer who went to elaborate lengths to get away with the deed

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: Nick battles a creature made of living clay. Rosalee is troubled to discover many Wesen are angered by her engagement, and Trubel considers leaving town for her friends' sake. Meanwhile, the team makes a breakthrough regarding Nick's powers

programme.title: Snapped
programme.desc: How a private investigator stepped in to solve the case when a successful Texas lawyer and his wife were murdered while sleeping in their bed

programme.title: World's Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: A profile ofDerrick Todd Lee, who murdered seven women in the Baton Rouge area of Louisiana,and was sentenced to death for his chilling crimes

programme.title: Caribbean Cops
programme.desc: The police force of St Lucia brace themselves for a long day, as Prince Charles and the Duchess of Cornwall visit the island

programme.title: UK Border Force
programme.desc: Officers at Heathrow's Terminal 3 question a passenger from Johannesburg arriving in London on a tourist visa, suspecting he may be planning to work in the country. Entry Clearance Officer Dan Brown, on secondment to the British High Commission in Delhi, encounters a man carrying false identity documents

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Following Australia's traffic enforcers as they deal with high-speed chases, defiant hooligans and explosive crashes

programme.title: Highway Patrol

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series focuses on Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong

programme.title: Legend of the Dragon
programme.desc: Ang is taken by Master Chin to Vietnam for further training after his rash behaviour almost leads to disaster

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies
programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance.

programme.title: Extreme Dinosaurs
programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times.

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times.

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Kong, Jason, jungle girl Lua, fun-loving Tann and wise Dr. Jenkins take on power-hungry scientists, ferocious prehistoric creatures and incredible magical beings to protect their unique island home

programme.title: Department S
programme.desc: An intruder breaks into a man's house and glues a clown mask to his face while he sleeps, causing him to die on waking. The team investigates, uncovering a blackmail plot

programme.title: The London Nobody Knows (1969)
programme.desc: James Mason presents a guide to some of the city's less well-known areas

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: The pilgrims have to reunite the lands of night and day - a tricky task given that the Queen of Night sucks the blood of the inhabitants of her land, while the King of Day forces his people into slavery. Cult classic following the adventures of Buddhist priest Tripitaka and his three disciples Monkey, Pigsy, and Sandy

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: A replica of Commander Koenig takes control of the moon - and orders its destruction. Sci-fi adventure, with Martin Landau and Barbara Bain

programme.title: Paris Blues (1961)
programme.desc: Two talented blues musicians attempt to make their mark on the Parisian music scene - but complications get in the way as they encounter a bevy of beautiful fans. Romantic drama, starring Paul Newman, Joanne Woodward, Sidney Poitier and Louis Armstrong

programme.title: This Is My Street (1964)
programme.desc: A bored housewife has an affair with her mother's lodger, but is driven to suicidal despair when he rejects her. Drama, starring Ian Hendry and June Ritchie

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: The Queen's Garden
programme.desc: Gardener Alan Titchmarsh is given exclusive access to the Buckingham Palace Garden in this two-part programme, as he visits the site over the course of a year, discovering hidden secrets as it changes across the seasons. He begins at the summer garden party where 8,000 people are invited on to the grounds, and meets beekeeper John Chapple as he harvests honey. He also explores the garden's origin, learning it was part of Henry VIII's hunting ground, and views the Rose Garden in late summer. As autumn arrives he watches the lawn being prepared for a special football match, and meets deputy gardens manager Claire Midgley-Adam as she battles to save a tree planted by the Queen's father George VI. He then helps royal florist Sharon Gaddes-Croasdale prepare the palace with holly and mistletoe at Christmas

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Light on Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough embarks on a search for the lights of nature, on a journey that will lead to ocean depths, claustrophobic caves and forests by night

programme.title: The World's Most Incredible Hotels
programme.desc: The most extraordinary, iconic, and luxurious hotels ever built, taking in 26 destinations across 18 countries

programme.title: The Outsiders (1983)
programme.desc: A teenager from the wrong side of the tracks leads a high-school gang in a revenge battle with the city's rich kids who caused the death of a friend. Francis Ford Coppola's drama, with Matt Dillon, C Thomas Howell, Tom Cruise, Patrick Swayze, Ralph Macchio, Emilio Estevez and Rob Lowe

programme.title: Let Him Have It (1991)
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the controversial 1952 murder trial in which 19-year-old Derek Bentley was sentenced to be hanged for killing a policeman - even though his friend Chris Craig was the one who fired the fatal gunshot. Starring Christopher Eccleston, Paul Reynolds, Tom Courtenay, Eileen Atkins, Tom Bell and Mark McGann

programme.title: The Grapes of Death (1978)
programme.desc: A woman stranded in a remote village discovers the pesticide used on the local vineyard is turning the residents into zombies. Horticultural horror, starring Marie-Georges Pascal, Felix Marten and Serge Marquand

programme.title: Beverley (2015)
programme.desc: A mixed race girl struggles to carve out a sense of identity in the shifting cultural landscape of 1980 Leicester. Short film, starring Sennia Nanua and Vicky McClure

programme.title: Fetishes
programme.desc: Filmmaker Nick Broomfield spends eight weeks at a pricey bondage establishment in New York City. Revealing the full range of fetishes, from rubber and infantilism, to asphyxiation and mummification.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Light on Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough embarks on a search for the lights of nature, on a journey that will lead to ocean depths, claustrophobic caves and forests by night

programme.title: Department S
programme.desc: A mysterious package holds the key to the location of $5 million stolen in a robbery - but when opened, it proves to contain only three plastic flowers and a cryptic passage from a book. Sixties drama, starring Peter Wyngarde, Joel Fabiani and Rosemary Nicols

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert heads to the Yorkshire Dales to explore the limestone geology of the dramatic pavements, cliffs and caves as well as the wildlife dependent upon it. He meets Ingleborough National Nature Reserve warden Colin Newlands, who introduces him to the extraordinary plant life of Scar Close, and squeezes down a gully in search of the cave spider. Ray teams up with researchers from the University of Leeds to survey the bat population and spends time observing the dipper - a small river bird able to walk underwater

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert explores Salisbury Plain in Wiltshire, home to Stonehenge and the largest army training area in the UK. He discovers an ancient invertebrate that depends on military manoeuvres to survive, and spots rare wildflowers in unlikely places as well as bird species, including the grey partridge, yellowhammer and corn bunting, that are in drastic decline elsewhere. Ray also meets David Waters, who has pioneered the reintroduction of the great bustard - the world's heaviest flying bird - after an absence of 180 years

programme.title: The World's Most Incredible Hotels
programme.desc: The most extraordinary, iconic, and luxurious hotels ever built, taking in 26 destinations across 18 countries

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: The couple meet a building inspector who's due to approve work on their new house - but disaster strikes when the top floor begins to collapse, leaving them with just a few seconds to escape. Back home, Mary's professional ethics are put to the test when a couple ask her to induce labour prematurely so they can attend to a business conference in Costa Rica, and William goes all out to rectify a serious insurance problem. Romantic drama, starring Martin Clunes, Julie Graham and Peter Pacey

programme.title: Seize the Day (1986)
programme.desc: An honest salesman fallen on hard times return to his New York roots and a reunion with his estranged father. Drama, starring Robin Williams and Glenne Headly

programme.title: The Hasty Heart (1949)
programme.desc: A belligerent Scottish soldier is hospitalised in Burma and takes out his anger on a fellow patient, unaware he has only weeks to live. Drama, starring Richard Todd, Patricia Neal, Ronald Reagan, Orlando Martins and Anthony Nicholls

programme.title: David Attenborough's Light on Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough embarks on a search for the lights of nature, on a journey that will lead to ocean depths, claustrophobic caves and forests by night

programme.title: London Live News

programme.title: Serving the Royals
programme.desc: Personal stories of the royal household's servants, including consultants, advisers and protectors of the House of Windsor

programme.title: Planet Without Apes
programme.desc: Reporter Michel Abdollahi goes on a worldwide search to uncover illegal trade of great apes

programme.title: South Riding
programme.desc: Ambitious teacher Sarah Burton returns to her native Yorkshire to become headmistress of a struggling girls' school. However, her sweeping plans to change everything from the curriculum to the school buildings lead to her making an enemy of troubled local landowner Robert Carne - a situation that becomes more complicated when she takes an interest in helping his fragile young daughter Midge. Andrew Davies's adaptation of Winifred Holtby's novel about community life in rural Yorkshire during the 1930s, starring Anna Maxwell Martin and David Morrissey, with Douglas Henshall, Shaun Dooley and Penelope Wilton

programme.title: The Outsiders (1983)
programme.desc: A teenager from the wrong side of the tracks leads a high-school gang in a revenge battle with the city's rich kids who caused the death of a friend. Francis Ford Coppola's drama, with Matt Dillon, C Thomas Howell, Tom Cruise, Patrick Swayze, Ralph Macchio, Emilio Estevez and Rob Lowe

programme.title: The Maids (1975)
programme.desc: Two maids hate their employer, so whenever they are alone in the house, they indulge in a sexual roleplay fantasy in which they take turns dressing up as her, so the other can pretend to murder her. Drama based on Jean Genet's stage play, starring Glenda Jackson and Susannah York

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: South Riding
programme.desc: Ambitious teacher Sarah Burton returns to her native Yorkshire to become headmistress of a struggling girls' school. However, her sweeping plans to change everything from the curriculum to the school buildings lead to her making an enemy of troubled local landowner Robert Carne - a situation that becomes more complicated when she takes an interest in helping his fragile young daughter Midge. Andrew Davies's adaptation of Winifred Holtby's novel about community life in rural Yorkshire during the 1930s, starring Anna Maxwell Martin and David Morrissey, with Douglas Henshall, Shaun Dooley and Penelope Wilton

programme.title: News Rewind
programme.desc: A digest of news and events from across London from the past few days.

programme.title: Talking Points
programme.desc: 'Current affairs affecting Londoners today and a look at the latest shows and films in the capital.

programme.title: Pocket Dragon Adventures
programme.desc: A group of very small dragons live with a kindly old wizard, they're not big enough to fly but that doesn't stop them having many adventures

programme.title: Legend of the Dragon
programme.desc: Falling debris causes Ang to lose his memory when Ling makes the Temple of the Dragons cave in

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies
programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance.

programme.title: Extreme Dinosaurs
programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times.

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times.

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Kong, Jason, jungle girl Lua, fun-loving Tann and wise Dr. Jenkins take on power-hungry scientists, ferocious prehistoric creatures and incredible magical beings to protect their unique island home

programme.title: Department S
programme.desc: The team investigate the disappearance of a factory's entire workforce - and how someone else has been using the facility as cover for a plot involving a nuclear power station

programme.title: Two Men in a Boat Chasing Spring
programme.desc: Jeremy Norman and his partner Derek Frost charter a motor yacht and set out on an amazing journey, chasing spring up the west coast of the British Isles

programme.title: Two Men in a Boat Chasing Spring
programme.desc: Jeremy Norman and his partner Derek Frost charter a motor yacht and set out on an amazing journey, chasing spring up the west coast of the British Isles

programme.title: Mudlarking the Thames
programme.desc: Nicola White unearths the river's historical treasures

programme.title: Serving the Royals
programme.desc: Personal stories of the royal household's servants, including consultants, advisers and protectors of the House of Windsor

programme.title: Lilies of the Field (1963)
programme.desc: Travelling handyman Homer Smith stops at a remote farm in the Arizona desert to get water when his car overheats, and encounter a group of German, Austrian and Hungarian. He agrees to repair a roof for them, but the mother superior has a bigger task in store for him. starring an Oscar-winning Sidney Poitier, with Francesca Jarvis, Lisa Mann and Isa Crino

programme.title: Eagles Over London (1969)
programme.desc: A group of German saboteurs infiltrates the Dunkirk evacuation to enter the UK unnoticed and disrupt British air defences. During the Battle of Britain, a squad of soldiers is assigned the task of identifying the enemy agents and preventing them from changing the course of the conflict overhead. Second World War drama, starring Frederick Stafford and Van Johnson

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: Poh joins Andre on a food adventure sourcing some of South Australia's finest produce. Back home, Poh creates two brilliant new recipes - the ultimate beef pie and coffee éclairs

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: t's opening day at the Central Market Café and Poh, Jono, Matt and Sara are nervous and excited

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London.

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: The pilgrims hatch a cunning plan to liberate the land of Codslow, ruled over by three evil immortals who depend on pearls, paper and wine to fuel their magical powers. Cult adventure, starring Masoaki Sakai

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes on Mary's last day at work before her maternity leave when an old friend commits suicide - and she reluctantly decides to call off the wedding. Meanwhile, William plans the funeral of a kindly churchwarden, and is shocked to discover the deceased belonged to a society of cross-dressers. Martin Clunes and Julie Graham star

programme.title: Muck and Brass
programme.desc: Drama, starring Mel Smith as a property developer who manipulates and negotiates his way through local politics in a midlands town. Originally broadcast in 1982

programme.title: Song for a Raggy Boy (2003)
programme.desc: A widower is hired to teach at a strict Catholic reformatory school, but the harsh regime soon fires his anger, leading to a series of confrontations with the heavy-handed priests in charge of the establishment. Fact-based drama set in 1939, starring Aidan Quinn, Iain Glen, Marc Warren and Dudley Sutton

programme.title: Poor Cow (1967)
programme.desc: A young mother lives in squalor with her good-for-nothing husband. Kitchen-sink drama directed by Ken Loach, starring Carol White and Terence Stamp

programme.title: Mysterious Creatures (2006)
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, starring Timothy Spall and Brenda Blethyn as the parents of a woman with mental health difficulties. When their daughter's hostile behaviour and the authorities' lack of support become too much to handle, the couple decide to commit suicide together, writing a letter to a local newspaper to explain the reasons behind their actions. The cast also includes Rebekah Staton and Judy Flynn

programme.title: Live Test Cricket
programme.desc: England v Ireland. Live coverage of day one of the one-off Test from Lord's, London, as England start their build-up towards the Ashes. The two sides have faced each other once before in a Test match back in 2019, when England won by 143 runs, as they bowled Ireland out for just 38 in their second innings, and they will be expecting another victory this time around

programme.title: Live Vitality T20 Blast Cricket
programme.desc: Yorkshire Vikings v Lancashire Lightning. Live coverage of the North Group match at Headingley. The rivals last met in this format in the 2022 semi-finals, when Lancashire won by six wickets with the help of an innings of 75 from Keaton Jennings. However, they would go on to suffer heartbreak in the final, when they lost to Hampshire Hawks by just one run
